updates.title: OpenAI launches Sora AI video generation app on Android following iOS release, expanding access to create, share, and remix AI-generated videos across mobile platforms.
Anthropic projects massive revenue growth to $70 billion by 2028 with $17 billion in cash flow, driven by rapid B2B adoption of Claude AI models.
Major AI infrastructure deals reshape cloud computing landscape as OpenAI secures $38B Amazon partnership while Microsoft strikes $9.7B deal with Australia's IREN for Nvidia GB300 GPU capacity.

Amazon integrates Alexa Plus AI assistant into Music streaming app while ClickUp launches new AI assistant to compete with Slack and Notion, showing broader AI integration across productivity platforms.
Shopify reports explosive AI commerce growth with AI-driven traffic up 7x and AI-generated orders up 11x since January, signaling mainstream adoption of AI shopping assistants.
